## types.DeepReadonly type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DeepReadonly<T extends Record<PropertyKey, any>> = T extends (...args: any[]) => any ? T : {
    readonly [Key in keyof T]: DeepReadonly<T[Key]>;
};
```
